revised_title: Botanical and Zoological Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author describes the botanical and zoological collections made in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in 1874-75. The collections include 18 Hepaticae species, 13 of which were obtained with fructification, and various mosses and other plant species. The author also discusses the similarities and differences between the collected species and their counterparts in other regions.
